page.title: 03BARLBOROUGH
page.content: Barlborough is a village in{North {East Derbyshire}standing on the edge of an{escarpment}near junction 30 on the M1. The people in Barlborough are very sociable.Most of them work in the surrounding towns and cities or local pits.Few work in the village where the only jobs are at Barlborough Metals or at local farms. The land in Barlborough is mostly grassland but there are a few arable fields. Barlborough's housing is a mixture of new and old.In Barlborough there are also several farms. In Barlborough there is a church called St.James which dates back to Norman times. In the centre of High Street stands a large gate which was built as a memorial to Sophie De Rodes by her
